title: Unfinished bowl (veg ball)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Unfinished veg balls are obtained by using half made veg balls on a range. They can then be garnished with equa leaves to make veg balls.

content:

Item ID9562

Unfinished veg balls are obtained by using half made veg balls on a range. They can then be garnished with equa leaves to make veg balls.

'''Unfinished veg balls''' are obtained by using [[Half made bowl (veg ball)|half made veg balls]] on a [[range]]. They can then be garnished with [[equa leaves]] to make [[veg ball]]s.
